titles.title: Alaska Native Vietnam Era Veterans Land Allotment Extension Act of 2025
Alaska Native Vietnam Era Veterans Land Allotment Extension Act of 2025
Alaska Native Vietnam Era Veterans Land Allotment Extension Act of 2025
Alaska Native Vietnam Era Veterans Land Allotment Extension Act of 2025
Alaska Native Vietnam Era Veterans Land Allotment Extension Act of 2025
To extend the Alaska Native Vietnam era veterans land allotment program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Indian and Insular Affairs.
Subcommittee on Indian and Insular Affairs Discharged
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.
Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 119-188.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 153.

action.text: Mr. Westerman moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 410.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Discharged, Referred To

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats
